lead_paragraph: All 20 holdouts ended their occupation of a police compound in Yerevan, the capital, which they seized July 17 to demand the freedom of the leader of their opposition group.

headline.print_headline: Armenian Gunmen Surrender After Two-Week Standoff
headline.main: Gunmen in Armenia Surrender After 2-Week Standoff With Police

snippet: All 20 holdouts ended their occupation of a police compound in Yerevan, the capital, which they seized July 17 to demand the freedom of the leader of their opposition group....
